creditline: Gift of Mary McGovern and William Woods
description: tan fabric printed with three women dressed in rust red, olive green and blue with goats and birds against a blue background with dark 'stars' and white stylized plants; central areas bordered in solid brown; outer border of stylized blue and brown plants; top and bottom edges sewn into sleeves with wooden shim inserted into top sleeve
markings: 5 University of Wisconsin - Milwaukee Archives stamps, on back; \'WPA/HANDICRAFT/PROJECT/#7040/MILWAUKEE/WISCONSIN/SPONSORED BY/MILWAUKEE/COUNTY AND/MILWAUKEE/STATE TEACHERS/COLLEGE\', lower left corner, verso; \'#2104\', in pencil, verso, near bottom border of central design; \'#2014\', in pencil, verso, near top edge
title: Panel
